init.title: Configure router
init.description: Configure device tracking and polling settings. Enter MAC addresses or hostnames (one per line or comma-separated) to track specific devices.

data.presence_signal_check: Check signal strength for presence detection

data_description.device_list: Enter MAC addresses or hostnames to track (e.g., B4:FB:E3:BC:F0:13 or Camera). One per line or comma-separated. Creates binary sensors, device trackers, and detailed sensors for each device.
data_description.scan_interval: How often to poll the router for updates (in seconds)
data_description.presence_timeout: How long a device can be offline before marked as away (in seconds)
data_description.presence_signal_check: For wireless devices, require valid signal to consider device present (disable for faster presence detection)
